sourcesContent:
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CalendarOptions } from '@fullcalendar/core'; import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid'; import timeGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/timegrid'; import interactionPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid'; import listPlugin from '@fullcalendar/list'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'MadrastyUI'; isConsidered = false; fos7aTime = '10:30:00 AM'; count = 0; interval = 45; fos7aDuration = 30; fos7aStartTime = new Date(); public deps : any[] = []; calendarOptions: CalendarOptions = { plugins: [dayGridPlugin,timeGridPlugin,interactionPlugin,listPlugin], initialView: 'timeGridDay', headerToolbar:{ right:'dayGridMonth,timeGridDay,listWeek' }, weekends: true, slotDuration :'00:45', slotLabelInterval: '00:45', slotMinTime:'09:00', slotMaxTime: '14:00', slotLabelContent: (arg) => { let html = ``; var start = arg.date; var end = new Date(`1970-01-01 ${this.fos7aTime}`); if(start.toLocaleTimeString() == end.toLocaleTimeString()){ this.isConsidered = true; } if(!this.isConsidered){ html = `
${arg.date.toLocaleTimeString()}
`; }else{ if(this.count == 0){ this.fos7aStartTime = end; this.fos7aStartTime = new Date(this.fos7aStartTime.getTime() + this.interval*this.count*60000); }else if(this.count == 1){ this.fos7aStartTime = new Date(this.fos7aStartTime.getTime() + this.fos7aDuration*60000); }else{ this.fos7aStartTime = new Date(this.fos7aStartTime.getTime() + this.interval*60000); } html = `
${this.fos7aStartTime.toLocaleTimeString()}
`; this.count++; } return { html, }; }, events: [ { title: 'Meeting', start: '2023-02-11T09:00:00.000', end: '2023-02-11T09:45:00.000' }, { title: 'Meeting12', start: '2023-02-11T09:00:00.000', end: '2023-02-11T09:45:00.000' }, { title: 'Meeting13', start: '2023-02-11T09:00:00.000', end: '2023-02-11T09:45:00.000' }, { title: 'Meeting2', start: '2023-02-11T09:45:00.000', end: '2023-02-11T10:30:00.000' }, { title: 'Meeting3', start: '2023-02-11T10:30:00.000', end: '2023-02-11T11:15:00.000' }, { title: 'Meeting4', start: '2023-02-11T11:15:00.000', end: '2023-02-11T12:00:00.000' }, { title: 'Meeting5', start: '2023-02-11T12:00:00.000', end: '2023-02-11T12:45:00.000' }, { title: 'Meeting6', start: '2023-02-11T12:45:00.000', end: '2023-02-11T13:30:00.000' }, { title: 'Meeting6', start: '2023-02-11T12:45:00.000', end: '2023-02-11T13:30:00.000' } ] }; model = { dep_name:'', dep_desc:'', dep_supervisor_id:0, parent_id: 0, dep_supervisor_name:'' } model2 = { dep_name:'', dep_desc:'', dep_supervisor_id:0, parent_id: 0, dep_supervisor_name:'' } constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit(): void { //this.getDepartments(); } resetForm(){ this.model = { dep_name:'', dep_desc:'', dep_supervisor_id:0, parent_id: 0, dep_supervisor_name:'' } } resetForm2(){ this.model2 = { dep_name:'', dep_desc:'', dep_supervisor_id:0, parent_id: 0, dep_supervisor_name:'' } document.getElementById('modalCloser')?.click(); } loadModel(depId:number,openModal:boolean){ this.deps.forEach((d)=>{ if(d.dep_id == depId){ this.model = d; this.model2 = d; if(openModal){ document.getElementById('modalCloser')?.click(); } } }); } submitForm(){ this.http.post("https://localhost:44337/api/department",this.model).subscribe( { next: (result : any)=>{ this.getDepartments(); this.resetForm(); }, error: (err)=>{ console.log(err); } } ) } submitForm2(){ this.http.post("https://localhost:44337/api/department",this.model2).subscribe( { next: (result : any)=>{ this.getDepartments(); this.resetForm2(); }, error: (err)=>{ console.log(err); } } ) } getDepartments(){ this.http.get("https://localhost:44337/api/department").subscribe( { next: (result : any)=>{ this.deps = result; }, error: (err)=>{ console.log(err); } } ) } }
